Documentation¶

The DbQueries class¶

class pandabox.db.queries.DbQueries(query_path: pathlib.Path, db_connection: psycopg2.extensions.connection)¶

Bases: object

A class used to group database queries together and provide managed threaded execution. The methods of this class are dynamically generated by passing a Path object to the constructor. This Path is then searched for files with a .sql extension, and with each file found, a method with the signature fetch_<my_query_name> is generated. The query can then be referenced by the name of the .sql file, omitting the .sql extension.

fetch_all() → pandabox.tools.PandaBox¶

Fetches all data sets as found in the query_path :returns: Collection of all fetched data sets accessible by name :rtype: PandaBox

fetch_many(*names) → pandabox.tools.PandaBox¶

Fetch multiple data sets using multi-threading :param *names: list of query names to fetch

Returns

Collection class which allows access to data frames by name

Return type

PandaBox
